title: Swami Vivekanand stayed here in 1890 - a holy place!
review: This place lies on the banks of river Kosi, a small river in Uttarakhand, which we came across while travelling from Delhi to Almora.  Swami Vivekanand, great saint from East India, stayed here in 1890, while travelling to the Himalayas.  A picturesque location, which gives peace to the travellers.

title: Almora Diaries
review: Its a must visit place. It has got historical significance, the place was home to BABA Balaknath. And later was glorified by BABA NEEM KAROLI MAHARAJ. A very serene place.

title: Peaceful visit
review: Visited the ashram on 21 st and 22 Nd September 2018. Found atmosphere very peaceful. The ashram and temple is beautiful built .

title: Peaceful and quiet are the words for this place
review: Amazingly serene and peaceful is what i would say for this place. Situated en-route to Almora. It has food stalls and guest houses near by. The temple itself is a quiet place. You can sit here for hours if you like.

title: Day picnic
review: Average place, can be visited for day picnic & if you are devotee of saint Neeb Karori. Nothing else to do
